content: {A惊叹}Hoho! I love that title. Taking care of everything and anything you need as your planet's "chief steward" is an honor!
info: 帮忙整理营地-莫白闲聊_主流程文本

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, how about you and Esassani go pick some <style=Highlight>fruit</style> from the trees nearby? You could also take the chance to look around a bit, hoho.
info: 帮忙整理营地-莫白闲聊_主流程文本

content: Ah, <style=NpcName>Esassani</style> and <style=NpcName>Glenn</style> are also looking forward to chatting with you. I'll have the area for nurturing the planet ready, and tell you all about it over tea.
info: 帮忙整理营地-莫白闲聊_主流程文本
帮忙整理营地-莫白闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A挠头}Ahem, anyway, I hope these humble experiences of mine may be able to serve you on your journey of nurturing the planet.
info: 帮忙整理营地-莫白闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A挠头}I'm sorry to have bothered you. Thanks again for everything you've done.

content: Mo worries, even though this is a completely new place, I've worked as a chef, a teacher, an architect...

content: {A抱歉}Thank you! Once you've gathered the <style=Highlight>fruit</style>, just bring them to me. I'll wash them and brew some tea.

content: So, you're the chief steward here?
